characters.name: Hitohito Tadano
characters.description:
**Height**: 168 cm (170.2 cm later)
**Position:** President
**Relatives**: [Hitomi Tadano](https://anilist.co/character/130878/Hitomi-Tadano) (younger sister)

Hitohito Tadano is a person average in almost every way. His name means, *just some guy*. He is the first to befriend [Shouko Komi](https://anilist.co/character/121956/Shouko-Komi).

Tadano is often described as an ordinary student with normal looks and average height and weight. His style of clothing is also considered to be relatively typical. His lone stand-out feature is the white cowlick in his black hair. When he was forced to cross-dress during the Cultural Festival, he was admired implicitly by the boys and Komi. His cross-dressing incorporates a short, red-haired girl's wig with pigtails.

Tadano suffered from chuunibyou in his second year of middle school. After confessing to a girl who immediately rejected him, he began to be self-conscious of his identity and drastically altered his style and outlook on life, making himself less noticeable to others. Almost everything about him - height, weight, appearance, academic achievements, athletic abilities, ice skating skills - is perfectly average. Despite his lack of talents, he's been shown to be good at observing and buying gifts for people.

On his first day of high school, he met Komi and was seated next to her. He later deduced that she had a communication disorder and became invested in helping her make 100 friends.

~!Tadano can be clueless when it comes to romance, being unable to tell when someone else harbors romantic feelings for him, such as Komi and [Rumiko Manbagi](https://anilist.co/character/127449). He has a crush on the two, but is very unclear about it compared to the two.!~

~!In chapter 301, it is revealed that Hitohito has a crush on Komi!~ ~!in chapter 302, Hitohito confesses to Komi.!~

characters.name: Shouko Komi
characters.description:
**Height**: 168 cm (later 169 cm)
**Position:** Goddess
**Relatives**: [Shousuke Komi](https://anilist.co/character/130870/Shousuke-Komi) (younger brother), [Shuuko Komi](https://anilist.co/character/130867/Shuuko-Komi) (mother), [Masayoshi Komi](https://anilist.co/character/130865/Masayoshi-Komi) (father), [Yuiko Komi](https://anilist.co/character/130875/Yuiko-Komi) (grandmother), [Akira Komi](https://anilist.co/character/130876/Akira-Komi) (cousin), [Sadayoshi Komi](https://anilist.co/character/130873/Sadayoshi-Komi) (uncle)

Shouko Komi is the main character of the series. Though she's regarded as the *Madonna* of their school, she's incapable of socializing with others to such a level where it can be called a communication disorder.

Shouko is described by her admirers as a girl with glossy dark purple/black hair that flows to her lower back, a slender body, and an incredibly beautiful face. She is usually seen wearing her school uniform.

Shouko hardly talks with people. She is unable to utter a word nor sound in her daily life due to her crippling anxiety and fear of rejection by her peers. She often writes whenever she can on her notebook and to the blackboard in class to answer people. She dreams of overcoming her adversity and desires to build friendly relationships with others and make 100 friends.

Shouko's first friend was [Hitohito Tadano](https://anilist.co/character/78093/Hitohito-Tadano). He was the first to discover her bad communication. He helps her make friends and cares for her well-being.

characters.name: Rumiko Manbagi
characters.description:
**Height**: 158.3 cm

Rumiko Manbagi is a gyaru girl who enters the second year of school with no friends. She becomes friends with Shouko Komi and Tadano Hitohito, her being the first Komi was able to befriend alone.

Manbagi is a manba-styled gyaru girl with tanned skin, bleached light hair, and a very girly fashion sense. She's introduced in ridiculous, heavy makeup, but once that's removed she is revealed to have a naturally beautiful face. She has shoulder-length, wavy blonde hair, a dark complexion, and a curvy figure. Manbagi had a short, black bob and fair skin when she was in middle school.

Manbagi is a cheerful, friendly girl who easily gets along with people once she becomes friends with them. In contrast to Komi, she's quite energetic and talkative. Though the two are more alike than it initially seems, both being sweet, lonely girls who desperately want friends. She seems somewhat naive and insecure, believing that her heavy makeup is what makes her pretty and thinking she doesn't compare to Komi.

Manbagi has a tsundere personality as she can be harsh to Tadano. That harshness has softened as she's become nicer, but can still be short-tempered when embarrassed.

~!She develops a crush on Hitohito. Her tsundere personality comes from her shyness about the feelings she's developed for him after being called cute.

In chapter 264, she mumbles her love for Hitohito while falling asleep. Tadano overheard her, but she's unaware of this.!~

characters.name: Najimi Osana
characters.description:
**Position:** Vice President

Najimi is a mysterious student whose gender is unknown. They are talented enough at communicating to easily befriend someone within minutes of meeting them.

Growing up, Najimi was constantly transferring from one school to another, allowing them to make millions of friends.

characters.name: Omoharu Nakanaka
characters.description: A student who usually speaks in dubious speech as a result of being a chuunibyou. She states that she was Arsot Les Primavera and that [Shouko Komi](https://anilist.co/character/121956/) is Princess Komilia.

characters.name: Masayoshi Komi
characters.description:
**Relatives**: [Yuiko Komi](https://anilist.co/character/130875) (mother), [Sadayoshi Komi](https://anilist.co/character/130873/Sadayoshi-Komi) (brother), [Shuuko Komi](https://anilist.co/character/130867/Shuuko-Komi) (wife), [Shouko Komi](https://anilist.co/character/121956) (daughter), [Shousuke Komi](https://anilist.co/character/130870/Shousuke-Komi) (son), [Akira Komi](https://anilist.co/character/130876/Akira-Komi) (niece)

Masayoshi Komi is Shouko's and Shousuke's father. He is seen as a dandy middle-aged man. Masayoshi rarely speaks and sometimes struggles to express himself verbally and can, at times, be easily flustered.

Complementary to his wife's youthful attitude, Masayoshi often appears mature and stoic. While he may come across as stern, he is often shown to be kind, considerate, and supportive.

Like his son, Masayoshi tends to make up for his lack of communication with strong actions and is generally talented in a variety of skills, including baking, woodworking, motorcycle riding, and sandcastle construction. Despite his stoic expression, he is adept at non-verbal communication and often holds silent conversations with his children, much to Shuuko's amusement.

characters.name: Shuuko Komi
characters.description:
**Relatives**: [Yuiko Komi](https://anilist.co/character/130875) (mother-in-law), [Masayoshi Komi](https://anilist.co/character/130865) (husband), [Sadayoshi Komi](https://anilist.co/character/130873/Sadayoshi-Komi) (brother-in-law), [Shouko Komi](https://anilist.co/character/121956) (daughter), [Shousuke Komi](https://anilist.co/character/130870/Shousuke-Komi) (son), [Akira Komi](https://anilist.co/character/130876/Akira-Komi) (niece)

Shuuko Komi, formerly known as Shuuko Nimi, is Shouko and Shousuke's mother. She looks like her daughter, but her personality is that of a teenager, claiming to be forever 17 years old. When despaired, she ages into *forever 18*

Corresponding to her son and daughter, Shuuko is considered beautiful. In contrast, she's very communicative and wonders how her family gets along despite not talking.

When young, she was bored of school and did not think much of Masayoshi until seeing him do various things on par with professionals. She slowly fell in love with him, despite his deadpan and silent demeanor.

(Source: Komi-san Wiki, edited)

characters.name: Makoto Katai
characters.description:
With the face of a delinquent, Katai is actually a nervous, awkward wreck who constantly stumbles over his words, with a goal to overcome his own awkwardness and make friends.

Tadano immediately sees through his false threatening nature and quickly becomes one of Katai's closest friends.

He views Komi as his "master" and thinks she's constantly cheering him on to become better friends with Tadano.

characters.name: Himiko Agari
characters.description: Himiko Agari is introduced as a shy insecure girl. She also runs a ramen shop review blog and considers herself a "ramen expert."

characters.name: Shousuke Komi
characters.description:
**Relatives**: [Yuiko Komi](https://anilist.co/character/130875) (grandmother), [Masayoshi Komi](https://anilist.co/character/130865) (father), [Shuuko Komi](https://anilist.co/character/130867) (mother), [Sadayoshi Komi](https://anilist.co/character/130873/Sadayoshi-Komi) (uncle), [Ryouko Komi](https://anilist.co/character/130877/Ryouko-Komi) (aunt), [Shouko Komi](https://anilist.co/character/121956) (older sister), [Akira Komi](https://anilist.co/character/130876/Akira-Komi) (cousin)

Shousuke Komi is Shouko's younger brother. He's quiet most of the time but can converse well.

Shousuke has short trimmed hair and his eyes are usually hidden with his bangs. Still, his very appearance is similar to his mother and sister and can be referred to as a handsome man.

Shousuke appears to share many traits with his older sister, often choosing to remain silent and being widely popular among his peers as a result. Unlike Shouko, who stays quiet mainly because of her anxieties and problems communicating, Shousuke doesn't feel bothered talking, perfectly capable of communicating without speaking in the first place.

He is very apathetic, often neglecting to do anything he deems annoying or pointless, such as introducing himself to the class, instead opting to remain silent. In contrast to his sister, whose goal is to make friends, Shousuke seems to be perfectly content being by himself as he often flat-out ignores any classmates who invite him to eat lunch with them.

(Source: Komi-san Wiki, edited)

characters.name: Makeru Yadano
characters.description: Makeru Yadano is a competitive girl who likes to compete herself to Shouko.

characters.name: Sadayoshi Komi
characters.description: Sadayoshi Komi is Shouko's uncle and her father's brother. Shouko thinks she gets along well with him because they have similar personality just like her father.

characters.name: Ren Yamai
characters.description: Ren Yamai is one of Komi Shouko's classmates from Class 1-1.

characters.name: Yuiko Komi
characters.description:
**Relatives**: [Masayoshi Komi](https://anilist.co/character/130865/Masayoshi-Komi) (son), [Sadayoshi Komi](https://anilist.co/character/130873/Sadayoshi-Komi) (son), [Shuuko Komi](https://anilist.co/character/130867/Shuuko-Komi) (daughter-in-law), [Ryouko Komi](https://anilist.co/character/130877/Ryouko-Komi) (daughter-in-law), [Akira Komi](https://anilist.co/character/130876/Akira-Komi) (granddaughter), [Shouko Komi](https://anilist.co/character/121956/Shouko-Komi) (granddaughter), [Shousuke Komi](https://anilist.co/character/130870/Shousuke-Komi) (grandson)

Yuiko Komi is Shouko, Akira, and Shousuke's grandmother. She's strict but gentle towards her family. When visiting, she usually challenges them to games.

characters.name: Akira Komi
characters.description: Akira Komi is Shousuke and Shouko's cousin. She was originally scared of Shouko before because of Shouko's inability to speak and constant staring at Akira silently. The two become close during her Udon festival visit after Shouko tickled her.

characters.name: Ryouko Komi
characters.description: Ryokuo Komi is Shouko's aunt. She is just as lively as Shouko's mother so she sometimes unknowingly intimidate Shouko.

characters.name: Hitomi Tadano
characters.description:
**Relatives**: [Hitohito Tadano](https://anilist.co/character/78093) (older brother)

Hitomi Tadano is the younger sister of Hitohito Tadano. She bears resemblance to her brother in terms of understanding people's minds. She is active, unlike her brother who is timid and more passive in doing things.

Hitomi is a short girl that shares the same big beady eyes as her older brother and make similar expressions. She wears her medium length hair in two short twin-tails.

In contrast to her older brother, who is usually seen as "normal", Hitomi is an energetic and eccentric girl. Unlike her more self-conscious brother, she's not as concerned with what others think, doing odd things such as introducing herself via rapping and not being embarrassed by it. Because of her cheery nature, she is well-liked among her peers.

Hitomi is rather blunt and forthright, openly claiming that she's not very good in either grades or sports during her class introduction. She does not seem to possess the same level of self-awareness as her older brother and tends to jump to conclusions.

When [Shousuke Komi](https://anilist.co/character/130870/Shousuke-Komi) wasn't talking to her, Hitomi assumed he had a communication disorder when he was choosing to ignore her. Nonetheless, she does her best to "help" him communicate.

characters.name: Nokoko Inaka
characters.description: Nokoko Inaka is a with a complex about her coming from the countryside. She later became friends with Shouko.

characters.name: Chusaku  Kometani
characters.description: Chusaku Kometani is introduced with Naruse Shisuto to commentate on his inner thoughts.

characters.name: Akako  Onigashima
characters.description:
Onigashima Akako is originally part of Yamai Ren's friend group.
Her name translates to Red Girl from Oni Island which is a reference to the tale of Momotarou.

characters.name: Amami Satou
characters.description:
Satou Amami is a student in class 1-1.
Her name translaters to sweet as sugar.

characters.name: Shisuto Naruse
characters.description:
Naruse is a person who believes that all people are his fans and the reason he is not approached is because others think he is too good for them too talk to.

All of his thoughts are commentated on by Kometani Chuusaku.

characters.name: Shizuka Odoka
characters.description: Odoka Shizuka is a second-year at Itan Private High School

characters.name: Kingyo Baba
characters.description: Baba Kingyo is a second-year at Itan Private High School.
